item.description:
To help us get to know each other and facilitate discussion, with each participants permission, I will circulate a list of each participants; with a brief bio / areas of knowledge, familiarity, goals / links to current or past projects. If you want to attend meeting but havent submitted this info, I put these questions in the profile section or you can email the info to me and I will update our list.

UPDATE: I found a new great location for us to meet.

See you soon!

group.name: Northampton Web Developers/ Web Designers Meetup Group

item.name: The Northampton Web Standards July 12 Meetup
